verses.verse: It <S%H120>happened,<s%> when men <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7231>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were born to <S%H3205>them,<s%>

that <S%H1121>God<s%>'s sons <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H2896>beautiful,<s%> and <S%H2007>they<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> for themselves <S%H802>wives<s%> of all that they <S%H977>chose.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> will not <S%H1777>strive<s%> with <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> because he <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> yet will his <S%H3117>days<s%> be one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>"

The <S%H5303>Nephilim<s%> were in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> and also <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> They <S%H3205>bore<s%> children to <S%H1992>them.<s%> Those were the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> who were of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and that every <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>continually.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H5162>sorry<s%> that he had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H6087>grieved<s%> him <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H4229>destroy<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> whom I have <S%H1254>created<s%> from the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5704>along<s%> with <S%H929>animals,<s%> creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> and <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> for I am <S%H5162>sorry<s%> that I have made <S%H6213>them.<s%>"
But <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

This is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah.<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H8549>blameless<s%> among the <S%H1755>people<s%> of his <S%H5146>time.<s%> Noah <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and saw that it was <S%H7843>corrupt,<s%> for all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> had <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> "The <S%H7093>end<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H6440>me,<s%> for the <S%H776>earth<s%> is filled <S%H4390>with<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> through <S%H6440>them.<s%> <S%H7843>Behold,<s%> I will destroy them <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Make a ship of gopher <S%H6213>wood.<s%> You shall <S%H753>make<s%> rooms in <S%H8392>the<s%> <S%H7969>ship,<s%> and shall <S%H3967>seal<s%> it inside <S%H7341>and<s%> outside with <S%H520>pitch.<s%>

This is how you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H753>it.<s%> The length of the <S%H8392>ship<s%> will be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6672>roof<s%> in the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> and you shall <S%H3615>finish<s%> it to a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H4605>upward.<s%> You shall <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8392>ship<s%> in its <S%H6654>side.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it with <S%H8482>lower,<s%> <S%H8145>second,<s%> and third <S%H7992>levels.<s%>

<S%H2009>I,<s%> even <S%H589>I,<s%> do <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> on this <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> having the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> <S%H3605>Everything<s%> that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H1478>die.<s%>

But I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H935>you.<s%> You shall come <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> <S%H859>you,<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' wives with <S%H802>you.<s%>

Of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of every sort into the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> to keep them <S%H2421>alive<s%> with <S%H2145>you.<s%> They shall be male and <S%H5347>female.<s%>

Of the <S%H5775>birds<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> of the <S%H929>livestock<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind,<s%> of every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> after its <S%H4327>kind,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of every sort shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2421>you,<s%> to keep them alive.
<S%H3947>Take<s%> with you of all <S%H3978>food<s%> that is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> it to <S%H402>yourself;<s%> and it will be for food for you, and for them."
Thus <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%> According to all that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>him,<s%> so he did.
